snippet: With the game winding down and his team facing a double-digit deficit, Florida coach Billy Donovan turned to an NCAA official sitting courtside and jokingly asked if they could start over....

headline.print_headline: Guards Flounder, Florida Falls in Final Four
headline.main: Guards Flounder, Florida Falls in Final Four

lead_paragraph: With the game winding down and his team facing a double-digit deficit, Florida coach Billy Donovan turned to an NCAA official sitting courtside and jokingly asked if they could start over.
